org.polarsys.chess.core.views

Class ViewUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.polarsys.chess.core.views.ViewUtils

  • public class ViewUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods to deal with design views.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public static org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package getView(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject element)
        Gets the corresponding design view the model element resides in. This method returns the 'physical' view of an element , hence the owning package stereotyped with the corresponding design view.
        Parameters:
        element - the model element
        Returns:
        the Package stereotyped with the corresponding design view

      • isDeploymentView

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isDeploymentView(DiagramStatus.DesignView view)
        Deprecated. use #isDesignView(DesignView, String) instead.
        Checks if the current design view (represented by the DesignView parameter) is the deployment view.
        Parameters:
        view - the design view, can be null
        Returns:
        true if it is the deployment view, false otherwise

      • isDesignView

        public static boolean isDesignView(DiagramStatus.DesignView view,
                                   java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the current design view has the corresponding name. If the name passed does not corresponds to a predefined design view an IllegalArgumentException is raised. Typical usage: //check if the current view is a deployment view //get the DesignView service designViewService = ... isDeploymentView = ViewUtils.isDesignView(designViewService, CHESSProfileManager.DEPLOYMENT_VIEW);
        Parameters:
        view - the design view, can be null
        name - the name of the design view to check against
        Returns:
        true if it is the desired view, false otherwise

      • isDesignView

        public static boolean isDesignView(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package pkg,
                                   java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the Package passed as a parameter represents an actual design view.
        Parameters:
        pkg - the package to check
        name - the design view name
        Returns:
        true if the package represents the desired design view, false otherwise

      • isDeploymentView

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isDeploymentView(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package pkg)
        Deprecated. use isDesignView(pkg, CHESSProfileManager.DEPLOYMENT_VIEW)
        Checks if is deployment view.
        Parameters:
        pkg - the pkg
        Returns:
        true, if is deployment view

      • isElementWritable_

        public static boolean isElementWritable_(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject element,
                                         java.lang.Object feature,
                                         DiagramStatus.DesignView currentView,
                                         org.polarsys.chess.chessmlprofile.Core.Domain theDomain)
        Checks if the current view has write access to (i.e can edit) the element/feature passed.
        Parameters:
        element - the model element
        feature - the feature
        currentView - the DesignView service
        theDomain - the the domain
        Returns:
        true if the design view can write on the element

      • isElementWritable_

        public static boolean isElementWritable_(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject element,
                                         java.lang.Object feature,
                                         java.lang.String viewName,
                                         DiagramStatus.DesignView currentView,
                                         org.polarsys.chess.chessmlprofile.Core.Domain theDomain)
        Checks if the given view has write access to (i.e can edit) the element/feature passed.
        Parameters:
        element - the model element
        feature - the feature
        viewName - the view's name
        currentView - the current view
        theDomain - the the domain
        Returns:
        true if the view can write on the element

      • isElementInstantiable

        public static boolean isElementInstantiable(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject element,
                                            java.lang.Object feature,
                                            DiagramStatus.DesignView currentView,
                                            org.polarsys.chess.chessmlprofile.Core.Domain theDomain)
        Checks if the current view owns (i.e. can create) the element/feature passed.
        Parameters:
        element - the element
        feature - the feature
        currentView - the DesignView service
        theDomain - the the domain
        Returns:
        true if the design view owns the element

      • hasConcurrentViews

        public static boolean hasConcurrentViews(DiagramStatus.DesignView currentView)
        Checks if the current view has virtual views activated. For example if the COMPONENT_VIEW has also the EXTRAFUNCTIONAL_VIEW activated on top of it then this method returns true.
        Parameters:
        currentView - the DesignView service
        Returns:
        true if there are virtual view activated.

      • hasConcurrentViews

        public static boolean hasConcurrentViews(java.lang.String viewName)
        Checks if a design view can have virtual views.
        Parameters:
        viewName - the name of the view
        Returns:
        true if this view can have virtual views.

        the name of the current actual view.
